game.name: Soul Rift
game.categories: Single-player, Partial Controller Support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Soul Rift is a mix of RPG and RTS in a magical world where you will take on the role of a wizard with an army of magical creatures. - Learn spells and use them in tactical battles. - Summon a variety of creatures. - Build magical structures that improve your abilities.
